answers.answer: I would if I was you. But it may require a culture swab
Some tthey test for in your blood and some with a vaginal swab right?
Yep, chlamydia and gonorrhea are tested through a swab

Actually, chlamydia and gonorreah can be tested through urine and a blood test. When I was 21 I contracted chlamydia from my ex boyfriend and the only test I had to take was a urine and blood test and that's how they found it.
I would definitely get tested your already there mine as well. I always ask to be tested whenever I get any type of blood work done.
Oh can they really? I was tested for all of it through a swab the first ob visit and then for gonorrhea and chlamydia a few months ago via swab again.
Gonorrhea and chlamydia can both be tested through urine. I had to go and get tested for a similar reason and that's all they took.

question: I think my fiance was cheating on me before I left him. Should I get an STD test done when I get my gestational diabetes blood work drawn?
title: STD testing
